aup: You may not use the services to publish content or engage in activity that is illegal under applicable law, that is harmful to others, or that would subject us to liability, including, without limitation, in connection with any of the following, each of which is prohibited under this AUP:Phishing or engaging in identity theft, Distributing computer viruses, worms, trojan horses or other malicious code, Distributing pornography or adult related content or offering any escort services
